xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 3 Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka » 3.1 Kusalattika, Sappaccayaduka » 3.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Sappaccayaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
1.
1091Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
1092Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1093Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1094Kusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1095Akusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
2.
1096Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1097Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1098Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
3.
1099Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< 3.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup Paccanīya >>
